scripts.tsc: echo 'TypeScript checking is handled from the root workspace'
scripts.prisma:generate: docker compose -f ../docker-compose.dev.yml exec prisma pnpm prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:migrate: docker compose -f ../docker-compose.dev.yml exec prisma pnpm prisma migrate dev --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:reset: docker compose -f ../docker-compose.dev.yml exec prisma pnpm prisma migrate reset --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:studio: docker compose -f ../docker-compose.dev.yml exec prisma pnpm prisma studio --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma
